WorkItem.Summary: [Buffs] Potion buffs need to be changed to use SpecialEffects

Comments.Message: It'd work right if we just set it to whatever duration, on use, with an incredibly long cooldown?
I think that should work yes.

From a tank view, it's best to not average the armor pot and rather leave it as on/of switch separate from on use effects.
Agree with the haste pot though, I just created the pot to have it present at all.
You can get about double the duration from the armor pot, by drinking just before pulling, but probably not something we want to add to default behaviour.
